channel.title: cloudnative on Sergio Méndez Website
channel.description: Recent content in cloudnative on Sergio Méndez Website

item.title: Cloud Native and CNCF Projects, CNCF Students. Guatemala/India
item.description:
I hosted and speak in a live streaming for CNCF Students in Spanish, my students present the concepts of Cloud Native, CNCF projects, and how to start contributing. Online Event.

Event Link |

item.title: Cloud Native - Cloud Native Students Day URACCAN, Nicaragua
item.description:
This talk was about Cloud Native, it explains the theory behind and how CNCF is involved in the state of art of Open Source projects in the context of cloud native. This talk was presented on Cloud Native Students Day URACCAN, Nicaragua. Online event.

Event Link | Slides
